Documentation üîé

Documentation üîé#

Main Features:

  • A physics-based model developed in python to estimate rainfall induced by tropical cyclones üåÄ.

  • Simulate convective tropical cyclone rainfall by correlating the precipitation rate üå®Ô∏è with the total upward wind velocity üå¨Ô∏è within the tropical cyclone vortex.

  • Integrate with outputs from tropical cyclone downscaling models driven by large-scale environmental conditions from GCMs üåé.

  • Generate detailed spatial-temporal tropical cyclone rainfall patterns that align with hurricane tracks.

This documentation explains how to install and use pyTCR.

Installation

Install pyTCR using your favourite package manager.
